QuestData.Title: Akiris by the Bundle
QuestData.Description: It's not easy running a combination 5-star exotic resort/jungle resource salvaging plant! That is, it wouldn't be easy, if I didn't have the organizational skills of a trade prince's personal assistant!$b$bThe first trick is multitasking. For example: the naga explorers to our south carry a valuable ocean reed - Akiris reeds. We can sell these reeds to our clients overseas, and we can also stuff our visitors' mattresses with them! Come to think of it, we could probably use some more of that stuff.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 6 Akiris Reeds from Naga Explorers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Let's see... we're going to need some shotguns for our nature hikes, rowboats for the oil rig day trip, and...$b$bOh, you're back already?
QuestData.RewardText: Hey hey! Not bad, not bad at all! You may have a future in resource acquisition. Or hotel management.
